system.descriptionText: Character chooses a Comrade in Cohesion who is Wounded and makes a +20 Charm or Intimidate Test. If successful Comrade regains the Ability to Run for the remainder of the encounter despite being wounded.

description.value: Character chooses a Comrade in Cohesion who is Wounded and makes a +20 Charm or Intimidate Test. If successful Comrade regains the Ability to Run for the remainder of the encounter despite being wounded.
